From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 Indian Hindi-language drama film


Dedh Lakh Ka DulhaDirected byAbhay Pratap SinghScreenplay byAbhay Pratap SinghStory byAbhay Pratap SinghProduced byKK Films CreationsJaya ChhedaStarringAkhilendra MishraAbhay Pratap SinghIshtiyak KhanCinematographyDK SharmaEdited byArun Kumar SingRaghubir SinghMusic byShahjahan SheikhProductioncompanyAPS PicturesDistributed byKK Music WorldRelease date
30 December 2022 (2022-12-30)
[1]Running time128 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Dedh Lakh Ka Dulha is an Indian Hindi-language comedy drama film directed by Abhay Pratap Singh.[2] The films stars Akhilendra Mishra, Ishtiyak Khan, Harshita Panwar and Dhruv Chheda.[3][4]


Cast[edit]
Akhilendra Mishra[5]
Abhay Pratap Singh[6]
Ishtiyak Khan
Harshita Panwar
Dhruv Chheda
Ahsan Khan
Synopsis[edit]
The story of the film is based upon how a father, played by Akhilendra Mishra finds a groom worth 1.5 Rupee instead of 1.5 Lakh Rupees for his daughter. Later the film revolves around the truth of the groom whether he is worth 1.5 Lakh or not.[7][8]

Soundtrack[edit]
The Music and background score were composed by Shahjahan Sheikh, the first collaboration with KK Films Creations.

Dedh Lakh DulhaSoundtrack album by Shahjahan SheikhGenreFilm soundtrackLanguageHindiLabelKK Music WorldProducerKK Films Creations
Track list[edit]
All lyrics are written by Abhay Pratap Singh; all music is composed by Shahjahan SheikhTrack ListingNo.TitleSinger(s)Length1."Guddu Naach[9]"Shahid Mallya3:212."O Mere Dilbar"Kumar Sanu4:03
Filming[edit]
The film is mostly shot in Agra, Uttar Pradesh and Naigaon, Mumbai, Maharashtra.[10]
